QuestData.Title: Sigil of Thoradin
QuestData.Description: In life, I divided the sigil of Thoradin into five pieces to protect it, spreading it among my most loyal men. This too failed, but my successor will have done the same.$B$BThe defenders of Stromgarde hold the pieces of the sigil yet again. Slay them, and bring the shards to me; I will reassemble them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Sigil Fragments from Stromgarde defenders in Stromgarde Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: All five pieces are needed to restore the sigil...
QuestData.RewardText: Thoradin was the founder of Arathor. Just as I join these fragments together, he joined the scattered tribes of humans into their first great nation.$B$BBut I'm sure you're not interested in such drivel. Forgive me. Old memories are often hard to bury.
